Auckland construction company MaxBuild, director Munesh Kumar sentenced for cartel conduct bid rigging https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/auckland-construction-company-maxbuild-director-munesh-kumar-sentenced-for-cartel-conduct-bid-rigging/GDZZPEPIAFG3NBQAQGQHCKRBTM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/auckland-construction-company-maxbuild-director-munesh-kumar-sentenced-for-cartel-conduct-bid-rigging/GDZZPEPIAFG3NBQAQGQHCKRBTM/ Craig Kapitan'It’s cheating the system,' a judge said today as MaxBuild's director was sentenced. He and his company have both pleaded guilty to cartel conduct via construction project bid rigging. Photo / Craig Kapitan
